name: hacss
description: Hackable inline style language embedded in HTML classes
author: Nick Saunders <nick@saunde.rs>

scripts.format: prettier --trailing-comma all --parser babel --write .eslintrc.js cli.js index.js output.js config/*.js
scripts.test: ./cli.js --output test/styles.css --config test/config.js test/index.html && git diff --exit-code test/styles.css && ./test/output.js
